document.full_text: china's former olympic and world 110 meters hurdles champion liu xiang ended american david oliver's winning streak of 18 finals at the shanghai diamond league meeting sunday.
document.title: liu xiang ends oliver's winning streak in high hurdles
lines_and_colors: china's former olympic and world 110 meters hurdles champion liu xiang ended american david oliver's winning streak of 18 finals at the shanghai diamond league meeting sunday.
